column1: '''Jakub Tymiński 'Ominous'''' is editor of The Polish Tolkienists Almanac ''[[Aiglos (journal)
column2: Aiglos]]''. Associate from [[2013]] and editorial secretary from [[September]] [[2014]] til present.<ref>The editors of ''Aiglos'' http://aiglos.tolkien.com.pl/english/issues.php (accessed 3 September 2016)</ref> He has also contributed articles and artworks to the journal.
